<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:def="http://soap.upskills.in/soap/default?services=catalogProductRepositoryV1">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <def:catalogProductRepositoryV1SaveRequest>\r <product>\r <sku>${Product Properties#sku}</sku> <name>${Product Properties#name}</name> <attributeSetId>${Product Properties#attributeSetId}</attributeSetId> //default value 4 <price>${Product Properties#price}</price> <typeId>${Product Properties#typeId}</typeId> //for value refer catalogProductTypeListV1 WSDL Endpoint </product>\r
</def:catalogProductRepositoryV1SaveRequest>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
